data.displayName: Living Energy Solar Saver (TOU Interval V2)

meteringCharges.description: Charges may vary, please contact us on 131806 for specific metering charges.

fees.description: Connection fee (GST incl) for standard move in requests during business hours. Fees may vary. See Additional Fee Information for details.
Disconnection fee (GST incl) generally applies for any move-out request. Fees may vary. See Additional Fee Information for details.

electricityContract.terms: This offer is available to residential customers currently within the Energex distribution zone with applicable network tariff. Please visit www.redenergy.com.au/terms for full T&Cs applicable to this offer. Solar Feed-In T&Cs can be found at www.redenergy.com.au/solar-feed-in-tariffs.
electricityContract.variation: We may vary your rates in line with our Customer Charter and in accordance with Relevant Laws. If we increase your rates, we will provide written notice at least 10 business days prior to the variation, and we will give you 5 business days notice if we decrease your rates.

eligibility.description: You have solar panels and your solar system is net metered.

singleRate.description: Controlled load 2 rates are available during times specified by your distributor

greenPowerCharges.description: Red Energy offers 100% GreenPower for an extra 3.3 cents per kWh. Please contact us on 131 806 for more information.

solarFeedInTariff.description: Red Energy FIT - GST included if any

electricityContract.onExpiryDescription: Your contract is ongoing until it is ended by you or us.
electricityContract.additionalFeeInformation: The fees and charges listed in the Fees and Charges section above apply to the standard move in and move out requests. For details on our additional fees and charges, please visit https://www.redenergy.com.au/additional-service-charges-qld or contact us on 131 806.
